thread.title: The Eyes | Consumer Prices on the March | The Facebook Monopoly

author: blogs.wsj.com
title: The Eyes | Consumer Prices on the March | The Facebook Monopoly
text:
This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. In today’s issue, the Federal Reserve anticipates firmer inflation and a hot economy, underlying consumer prices are pointing up, Europe’s economy flashes some warning signs, China says it’s not conceding anything to Trump, the White House prepares support […]
